metadata.Title: CVE-2014-8333 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible.
metadata.Description: The VMware driver in OpenStack Compute (Nova) before 2014.1.4 allows remote authenticated users to cause a denial of service (disk consumption) by deleting an instance in the resize state.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> requires use with unsupported VMware ESX driver. This is not compiled in to libvirt in the Ubuntu archive, which makes this code path unavailable in Ubuntu

criterions.comment: nova: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
